body_html:
Hi, has anyone been able to find a solution for this? Currently facing it with Cuda 8.0 (V8.0.44), CuDNN 7, Ubuntu 16.04, Tensorflow 1.2.1 and mono-gpu (GeForce GTX 1060).
Thanks!

EDIT: I removed CuDNN 7 and went back to CuDNN 5.1. There's a relative improvement but it's still super slow to load.

EDIT2: fixed it by re-installing completely the Nvidia drivers, CUDA (8.0) and CuDNN (6).

body:
Hi, has anyone been able to find a solution for this? Currently facing it with Cuda 8.0 (V8.0.44), CuDNN 7, Ubuntu 16.04, Tensorflow 1.2.1 and mono-gpu (GeForce GTX 1060).
Thanks!

EDIT: I removed CuDNN 7 and went back to CuDNN 5.1. There's a relative improvement but it's still super slow to load.

EDIT2: fixed it by re-installing completely the Nvidia drivers, CUDA (8.0) and CuDNN (6).
